translation.en: HERE YOU GO, MY FRIEND. MAKE SURE YOU GET US AS CLOSE AS YOU CAN!
translation.ko: 다 됐다 가능한 한 나한테 꽉 달라붙어!

translation.en: I'LL GIVE YOU SOMETHING EXTRA IF YOU MAKE IT A GOOD TRIP!
translation.ko: 운전 잘 해주면 추가로 돈 더 줄게요!

translation.en: I'M GONNA GET YOU CLOSE, MY FRIEND, BUT NOT TOO CLOSE. YOU DON'T WANT TO BE EATEN.
translation.ko: 위험하진 않지만 스릴은 느끼도록 해주죠! 사고 나면 안 되잖소

translation.en: - YOU READY, AMIGO? - [ Both ] READY!
ONE, TWO, THREE!
UH-UH, THIS IS GREAT! SCARED?
SEE ANYTHING YET? NO, NOT YET.
translation.ko: 뭐 보여요? 아니, 아직 아무것도 안 보여

translation.en: WHAT WAS THAT? WHOA!
I DON'T KNOW.
[ Boy ] WHAT'S HAPPENING? [ Man ] HOLD ON!
[ Groaning ] MAKE IT STOP!
WHAT HAPPENED TO THEM? I DON'T KNOW.
translation.ko: 둘 다 어떻게 된 거예요? 모르겠어

translation.en: OH, MY GOD!
WE'RE GONNA CRASH! WE'RE GONNA CRASH! NO, WE'RE NOT.
I'M GONNA CUT THIS LOOSE! LET GO OF THE ROPE! WE'RE GONNA CRASH!
translation.ko: 로프를 느슨하게 할 거야! 로프를 놔!

translation.en: - MOVE YOUR HANDS. - [ Crying ] COME ON!
HERE WE GO!
IT'S GONNA BE OKAY, BUD.
ACTUALLY, THOSE ARE HERBIVORES. THEY WOULDN'T BE INTERESTED IN FIGHTING EACH OTHER.
translation.ko: 찰리, 걔들은 초식 공룡이야 서로 안 싸워 얘들이 육식 공룡인데 서로 싸우는 걸 좋아하지

translation.en: BUT THESE ARE CARNIVORES, AND THEY REALLY LIKE FIGHTING WITH EACH OTHER.
translation.ko: 얘들이 육식 공룡인데 서로 싸우는 걸 좋아하지

translation.en: THEY USE THEIR TEETH AND CLAWS TO RIP EACH OTHER'S THROATS OUT.
translation.ko: 이빨과 발톱을 이용해서 서로의 목을 찢는단다

translation.en: ALAN, HE'S THREE. LET'S WAIT TILL HE'S FIVE.
translation.ko: 앨런, 찰리는 이제 겨우 3살밖에 안 됐어요

translation.en: OH, RIGHT. SORRY, CHARLIE.
ELLIE, IT'S TOM AGAIN. HE HAS TO TALK TO YOU ABOUT THE LAST CHAPTER.
translation.ko: - 엘리 - 네? 또 톰인데 지난 호에 대해서 꼭 얘기해야겠대요

translation.en: JUST TELL HIM I'M NOT GONNA LOSE THE JACK HORNER QUOTE.
translation.ko: 잭 호너의 문구는 절대 못 지운다고 해요

translation.en: MY EDITOR THINKS HE'S A PALEONTOLOGIST.
translation.ko: 우리 편집장은 자기가 고생물학자인 줄 알아요

translation.en: HEY, MARK. HEY, BABE, LOOK WHO'S HERE.
translation.ko: 우리 편집장은 자기가 고생물학자인 줄 알아요 자기야! 아빠 오셨다!

translation.en: THIS IS ALAN.
HI. NICE TO MEET YOU, ALAN.
DADDY, THIS IS A HERBIVORE... I'VE HEARD A LOT ABOUT YOU.
translation.ko: 아빠, 이건 초식 공룡이고 여긴 공룡 아저씨야

translation.en: AND THAT'S THE DINOSAUR MAN. DINOSAUR MAN?
translation.ko: 아빠, 이건 초식 공룡이고 여긴 공룡 아저씨야 공룡 아저씨?

translation.en: JACK, SAY MY NAME. IS MY NAME ALAN?
translation.ko: 잭, 내 이름을 말해 봐 내 이름이 앨런이니?

translation.en: IS MY NAME ALAN?
HE USED TO KNOW ME.
[ Laughing ] IT'S SAD.
HERE YOU GO. THANKS.
SO YOU KNOW MARK'S WORKING FOR THE STATE DEPARTMENT NOW.
YEAH. WHAT DO YOU DO, MARK?
INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS, MOSTLY TREATY LAW AND THINGS LIKE THAT.
translation.ko: 국제 협약 같은 국제 법에 관계된 일을 합니다

translation.en: [ Baby Crying ] UH-OH. CALL OF THE WILD ONE.
HERE, I'LL GET HER. YOU GUYS... CATCH UP.
THANKS, BABE.
HE'S A GREAT GUY. SO, WHAT ARE YOU WORKING ON NOW?
translation.ko: 정말 멋진 남자네 - 요즘은 무슨 연구 해요? - 거의 랍토르에 대한 거야

translation.en: RAPTORS, MOSTLY. MY FAVORITE.
translation.ko: - 요즘은 무슨 연구 해요? - 거의 랍토르에 대한 거야 내가 좋아하는 공룡이네요

translation.en: DO YOU REMEMBER THE SOUNDS THEY MADE?
I TRY NOT TO.
ELLIE, ALL OUR THEORIES ABOUT RAPTOR INTELLIGENCE,
translation.ko: 랍토르의 지적 능력에 대한 수많은 학설은

translation.en: WHAT THEY WERE CAPABLE OF-- WE WEREN'T EVEN CLOSE.
translation.ko: 랍토르의 지적 능력에 대한 수많은 학설은 랍토르를 과소평가 한 거였어

translation.en: WE DID CRANIAL SCANS OF A FOSSIL SKULL. TELL ME.
WE FOUND WHAT LOOKS LIKE A VERY SOPHISTICATED RESONATING CHAMBER.
translation.ko: 공명판이 굉장히 복잡한 구조로 만들어진 걸 알아냈어

translation.en: SO WE WERE RIGHT? THEY HAD THE ABILITY TO VOCALIZE?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 그럼 우리가 맞았네요? 음성을 내는 기능이 있어요?

translation.en: I'M CONVINCED THAT'S THE KEY TO THEIR SOCIAL INTELLIGENCE.
translation.ko: 바로 그게 사회적인 지적 능력이 있었다는 중요한 열쇠야

translation.en: WHICH EXPLAINS WHY THEY COULD WORK TOGETHER AS A TEAM.
translation.ko: 어떻게 무리를 지어 사냥을 했는지도 설명이 되고요

translation.en: AND COORDINATE THEIR ATTACKS SO THE PREY WOULDN'T KNOW WHAT WAS GOING ON.
translation.ko: 먹이가 알지 못하게 공격 전술도 세울 수 있었지

translation.en: - THEY COULD TALK TO EACH OTHER. - TO A DEGREE WE NEVER IMAGINED.
translation.ko: 서로 대화가 가능했군요 상상을 초월할 정도였지

translation.en: - [ Sighs ] - ELLIE, THEY WERE SMART.
THEY WERE SMARTER THAN DOLPHINS OR WHALES.
THEY WERE SMARTER THAN PRIMATES.
I JUST WANT TO SAY, IF YOU EVER NEED HELP WITH ANYTHING--
SOMETIMES YOU FORGET TO ASK.
SO YOU CAN CALL ME.
SURE. ANYTHING, ANYTIME.
YOU'RE STILL THE BEST.
I MEAN THAT.
THE LAST OF MY BREED.
[ Alan's Voice ] THROUGH THE PAINSTAKING STUDY OF THE ANTERIOR CHAMBER...
translation.ko: 앞에 놓인 여러 가지 표본을 정밀하게 연구한 결과

translation.en: IN MULTIPLE SPECIMENS, WE CAN DETERMINE THE EXCITING CORRELATION...
translation.ko: 앞에 놓인 여러 가지 표본을 정밀하게 연구한 결과 위쪽 구개와 발성 기관의 상호관계를 알 수 있었습니다

translation.en: BETWEEN THE UPPER PALATE AND THE LARYNX.
translation.ko: 위쪽 구개와 발성 기관의 상호관계를 알 수 있었습니다

translation.en: THIS LETS US THEORIZE-- THEORIZE, MIND YOU--
THAT THE RAPTOR WAS CAPABLE OF SOPHISTICATED VOCALIZATIONS...
translation.ko: 그래서 이런 학설이 가능합니다 랍토르들은 정교한 발성법을 가졌었고

translation.en: WHICH WOULD HAVE BEEN A TREMENDOUS EVOLUTIONARY ADVANTAGE.
translation.ko: 그것은 진화에 있어서 엄청난 우월성이라는 학설이죠

translation.en: RAPTORS WERE FIERCE, INTELLIGENT AND SOCIALLY SOPHISTICATED.
translation.ko: 랍토르들은 거칠고 영리하며 사회적인 생활을 했습니다

translation.en: THEY WERE ABLE TO HUNT IN NUMBERS... AND COORDINATE THEIR EFFORTS.
translation.ko: 무리를 지어 사냥해서 사냥 부담을 나눴었죠

translation.en: WERE IT NOT FOR THE CATACLYSMIC EVENTS WHICH OVERTOOK THEM,
IT IS ENTIRELY POSSIBLE THAT RAPTORS RATHER THAN HUMANS...
WOULD HAVE BECOME THE DOMINANT SPECIES ON THIS PLANET.
I HOPE THIS HAS BEEN OF INTEREST.
IT CERTAINLY EXCITES US AS PALEONTOLOGISTS.
translation.ko: 저희 같은 고생물학자들에겐 정말 흥분되는 일이죠

translation.en: SORRY. THERE'S MUCH, MUCH MORE TO DISCOVER.
translation.ko: 아직도 발견해야 할 것이 많다는 얘기니까요

translation.en: THAT IS WHY WE CONTINUE TO NEED AND ASK FOR YOUR SUPPORT.
translation.ko: 다시 말해 여러분의 지속적인 성원과 지원이 필요합니다

translation.en: THANK YOU.
THANK YOU VERY MUCH, DR. GRANT.
NOW, DOES ANYONE HAVE A QUESTION?
FINE. DOES ANYONE HAVE A QUESTION THAT DOES NOT RELATE TO JURASSIC PARK?
translation.ko: 좋아요 쥐라기 공원과 관련 없는 질문 있으신 분?

translation.en: OR THE INCIDENT IN SAN DIEGO... WHICH I DID NOT WITNESS?
translation.ko: 아니면 제가 보지 못한 샌디에이고 사건이 궁금하신가요?

translation.en: YES, SIR?
YOUR THEORY ON RAPTORS IS GOOD AND ALL, BUT ISN'T ALL THIS CONJECTURE MOOT?
translation.ko: 랍토르에 관한 학설은 훌륭하지만 모든 게 억측이 아닌가요?

translation.en: ONCE THE U.N. AND COSTA RICA AND EVERYONE DECIDES HOW TO HANDLE THAT SECOND ISLAND,
translation.ko: UN과 코스타리카 정부가 두 번째 섬 관리를 결정하면

translation.en: SCIENTISTS WILL JUST GO IN AND LOOK FOR THEMSELVES.
DINOSAURS LIVED 65 MILLION YEARS AGO.
WHAT IS LEFT OF THEM IS FOSSILIZED IN THE ROCKS.
AND IT IS IN THE ROCK THAT REAL SCIENTISTS MAKE REAL DISCOVERIES.
translation.ko: 진짜 과학자들은 그 돌 속에서 진짜 발견을 하는 겁니다

translation.en: NOW, WHAT JOHN HAMMOND AND INGEN DID AT JURASSIC PARK...
translation.ko: 존 해먼드 회장과 인젠사는 쥐라기 공원에

translation.en: IS CREATE GENETICALLY ENGINEERED THEME PARK MONSTERS,
NOTHING MORE AND NOTHING LESS.
ARE YOU SAYING THAT YOU WOULDN'T WANT TO GET ONTO ISLA SORNA... AND STUDY THEM, IF YOU HAD THE CHANCE?
translation.ko: 그럼 기회가 있어도 섬에 가서 연구를 안 하시겠다는 건가요?

translation.en: NO FORCE ON EARTH OR HEAVEN COULD GET ME ON THAT ISLAND.
translation.ko: 아무것도 절 그 섬으로 다시 가게는 못 합니다

translation.en: SO, WHAT WE GOT HERE, NASHY?
IRON HORN 20-MILLIMETER, GAS-OPERATED, SEMIAUTOMATIC,
TEN-SHOT MAGAZINE, ROTATING BOLT,
RECOIL-REDUCING MUZZLE BREAK, HIGH EXPLOSIVE INCENDIARY--
UDESKY. [ Ringing Continues ]
MR. UDESKY, THIS IS PAUL KIRBY. JUST CHECKING-- OH, YES, SIR.
translation.ko: 유데스키 씨 나 폴 커비요 네, 갈 준비 끝났어요

translation.en: WE'RE GOOD TO GO HERE. AS A MATTER OF FACT,
translation.ko: 네, 갈 준비 끝났어요 돈을 치르시는 대로 바로 떠날 겁니다

translation.en: I CAN LOCK THINGS DOWN JUST AS SOON AS YOU DROP ME THAT PAYMENT.
translation.ko: 돈을 치르시는 대로 바로 떠날 겁니다

translation.en: WELL, THAT'S RIGHT. TWO OF THE VERY BEST MEN I COULD POSSIBLY FIND.
translation.ko: 맞아요, 최고의 무기 전문가 두 명입니다 같이 일해본 적 있나요?

translation.en: HAVE YOU WORKED WITH THESE MEN? NO, SIR, I HAVEN'T WORKED WITH THEM PERSONALLY.
translation.ko: 같이 일해본 적 있나요? 개인적으론 함께 일했던 적은 없습니다만

translation.en: BUT, BELIEVE ME, SIR, BOTH OF THESE MEN COME VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
translation.ko: 꽤 실력이 좋은 사람들이라고 믿으셔도 좋습니다

translation.en: [ Paul ] ARE YOU ALL RIGHT?
NOTHING TO WORRY ABOUT, SIR.
IT'S GONNA BE A WALK IN THE PARK.
translation.ko: 이번 일은 공원 산책 정도 되겠네요

translation.en: BILLY, I DON'T THINK I'M DOING THIS RIGHT.
translation.ko: 빌리, 나 아무래도 제대로 하는 게 아닌가 봐

translation.en: LET'S TRY THE TOOTHBRUSH.
YOU GOT TO GO SLOWLY.
JUST TAKE A LITTLE BIT AT A TIME.
translation.ko: 조금씩 쓸어내는 거야 어떤 게 돌이고 어떤 게 뼈인지 전혀 구분이 안 가

translation.en: I CAN NEVER TELL WHAT'S ROCK AND WHAT'S BONE.
translation.ko: 어떤 게 돌이고 어떤 게 뼈인지 전혀 구분이 안 가

translation.en: TECHNICALLY, IT'S ALL ROCK.
THE CALCIUM IN THE BONES IS REPLACED DURING FOSSILIZATION.
translation.ko: 화석화가 되면서 돌이 뼛속의 칼슘을 대신 채웠지

translation.en: BUT YOU CAN FEEL THE DIFFERENCE. SEE?
ROUGH... SMOOTH.
ROUGH, SMOOTH.
DR. GRANT.
MR. BRENNAN.
SO, HOW'D IT GO?
WELL, IT'S NOT TOO LATE TO CHANGE YOUR MAJOR, BILLY.
translation.ko: 지금이라도 자네 전공을 바꾸기엔 늦지 않았어

translation.en: NOT GOOD, HUH? WORSE.
translation.ko: 안 좋았어요? 최악이지, 4주 안에 전부 짐을 싸야 해

translation.en: WE'RE GONNA HAVE TO PACK UP IN FOUR WEEKS. THREE.
translation.ko: 최악이지, 4주 안에 전부 짐을 싸야 해 3주예요

translation.en: I HAD TO RENT EQUIPMENT. COME HERE, I GOTTA SHOW YOU SOMETHING.
translation.ko: 몇몇 장비를 빌렸거든요 뭐 하나 보여 드릴게요

translation.en: I LIKE THE ABACUS, BILLY. YOU LIKE COMPUTERS, RIGHT?
translation.ko: 컴퓨터 좋아하시죠? 난 주판이 더 좋네

translation.en: MEET THE FUTURE OF PALEONTOLOGY. IT'S A RAPID PROTOTYPER.
I ENTER IN THE SCAN DATA FROM THE RAPTOR'S SKULL.
THE COMPUTER BREAKS IT DOWN INTO THOUSANDS OF SLICES.
translation.ko: 컴퓨터가 그것을 수천 개의 조각으로 나눈 후에

translation.en: THEN THIS THING SCULPTS IT, ONE LAYER AT A TIME.
translation.ko: 한 번에 한 층씩 조각을 하는 겁니다

translation.en: IT'S DONE. [ Beeps ]
translation.ko: 한 번에 한 층씩 조각을 하는 겁니다 "원형 복구 완성" 다 됐어요

translation.en: I GIVE YOU THE RESONATING CHAMBER OF A VELOCIRAPTOR.
LISTEN TO THIS.
WOW. THIS IS BRILLIANT, BILLY. REALLY, IT IS.
SAD TO SAY, IT'S JUST A LITTLE BIT LATE. [ Footsteps Approaching ]
DR. GRANT? PAUL KIRBY. KIRBY ENTERPRISES.
translation.ko: 그랜트 박사님? 커비 주식회사의 폴 커비입니다

translation.en: UH, MY CARD. HOW YOU DOING, BILLY?
WHAT CAN I DO FOR YOU, MR. KIRBY?
WELL, UM, FIRST THING, I'M A GREAT ADMIRER OF YOURS,
AND I HAVE A PROPOSITION I'D LIKE TO DISCUSS WITH YOU.
translation.ko: 그래서 한가지 제의를 하고 싶어서 왔죠

translation.en: WOULD YOU HAVE DINNER WITH MY WIFE AND ME THIS EVENING? IT'LL BE OUR TREAT.
translation.ko: 오늘 저녁에 저희 부부와 식사 어때요? 저희가 대접하죠

translation.en: WELL, THAT'D BE GREAT, BUT I'M TIRED. I'VE BEEN TRAVELING.
translation.ko: 말씀은 감사합니다만 여행에서 방금 돌아와 피곤해요

translation.en: BELIEVE ME, THIS WILL BE WORTH YOUR WHILE. MAYBE SOME OTHER TIME.
translation.ko: 나중에 하죠 절대 후회 안 하실 겁니다

translation.en: WE'D LOVE TO. OH, TERRIFIC.
THAT'S THE SPIRIT. GOOD. THIS EVENING THEN.
translation.ko: 정말 기쁘네요 그럼 오늘 저녁에 뵙죠

translation.en: OH, BILLY. DR. GRANT. HOW ARE YOU? MRS. KIRBY, HOW ARE YOU? AMANDA, BILLY.
SO WHAT ARE YOU BOYS DRINKING?
ICE PICK, CATFISH. TWO, PLEASE, CAT.
translation.ko: - 보드카 칵테일 줘요 - 같은 거로요 수년간 박사님의 연구를 존경해 왔죠

translation.en: REALLY TRULY INSPIRING. WE'VE ADMIRED YOUR WORK FOR YEARS.
translation.ko: 수년간 박사님의 연구를 존경해 왔죠 정말 대단했어요

translation.en: AMANDA AND I JUST LOVE THE OUTDOORS.
HECK, WE'VE BEEN ON JUST ABOUT EVERY ADVENTURE TOUR THEY CAN COME UP WITH.
THE NILE, GALAPAGOS, K2.
WE EVEN HAVE TWO SEATS RESERVED ON THE FIRST COMMERCIAL FLIGHT TO THE MOON.
translation.ko: 달로 갈 첫 여객기 자리도 예약해 놓았죠

translation.en: AND FOR OUR WEDDING ANNIVERSARY THIS YEAR WE WANTED TO DO SOMETHING REALLY SPECIAL.
translation.ko: 이번 저희 결혼기념일엔 정말 특별한 걸 원해요

translation.en: ONCE IN A LIFETIME. SOMETHING-- SO...
translation.ko: 평생 한 번 가볼 장소요 그래서 이슬라 소르나섬 상공 비행을 예약했는데

translation.en: I'VE CHARTERED AN AIRPLANE TO FLY US OVER ISLA SORNA...
translation.ko: 그래서 이슬라 소르나섬 상공 비행을 예약했는데

translation.en: AND WE'D LIKE YOU TO BE OUR GUIDE.
THERE YOU GO, GUYS.
THAT'S A VERY KIND OFFER, MR. KIRBY, BUT I'M A VERY, VERY BUSY MAN.
translation.ko: 굉장히 친절하신 제안이지만 전 굉장히 바쁜 사람입니다 괜찮은 사람을 소개해드릴 수...

translation.en: I CAN RECOMMEND A COUPLE OF GUYS WHO ARE REALLY HIGHLY QUALIFIED THAT--
NO, NO, NO. YOU'RE THE BEST.
translation.ko: 아니, 당신이 최고예요 공룡들을 직접 봤잖아요

translation.en: YOU'VE SEEN THESE ANIMALS IN THE FLESH. THERE'S NO ONE THAT EVEN COMES CLOSE TO YOU.
translation.ko: 아니, 당신이 최고예요 공룡들을 직접 봤잖아요 아무도 박사님과는 비교가 안 되죠

translation.en: YOU WOULDN'T BE ABLE TO FLY LOW ENOUGH TO SEE ANYTHING OF ANY REAL INTEREST.
translation.ko: 어차피 공룡을 볼 수 있을 만큼 낮게 비행도 못 해요

translation.en: WELL, SEE? THAT'S THE INTERESTING PART... BECAUSE WE HAVE PERMISSION TO FLY LOW.
[ Billy ] HOW LOW? I'M NO AVIATION EXPERT,
translation.ko: 얼마나 낮게요? 전 비행 전문가가 아니라 모르지만 우리가 가장 낮게 비행할걸요

translation.en: BUT A HECK OF A LOT LOWER THAN ANYBODY ELSE, I CAN TELL YOU.
translation.ko: 전 비행 전문가가 아니라 모르지만 우리가 가장 낮게 비행할걸요

translation.en: FROM WHAT I UNDERSTAND, IT'S PRETTY MUCH-- IT'S WHATEVER WE WANT.
translation.ko: 우리가 원하는 만큼 낮게 날 수 있을 거예요

translation.en: THAT'S HARD TO BELIEVE. YOU SEE, THROUGH MY BUSINESS DEALINGS--
translation.ko: 믿기 어렵군요 수출입을 하고 합병 등을 하는 제 사업의 성격상

translation.en: IMPORT, EXPORT, EMERGING MARKETS--
translation.ko: 수출입을 하고 합병 등을 하는 제 사업의 성격상

translation.en: I'VE MADE A LOT OF FRIENDS IN HIGH PLACES.
IN THIS CASE, THE COSTA RICAN GOVERNMENT.
DR. GRANT, YOU HAVE NO IDEA HOW IMPORTANT IT IS TO US THAT YOU COME ALONG.
MRS. KIRBY, I-I-- IT WOULD MAKE ALL THE DIFFERENCE.
translation.ko: 완전히 다른 경험일 테니까요 전... 현재 진행 중인 박사님 연구에 기부를 하고 싶습니다

translation.en: AND, OF COURSE, WE'D LOVE TO MAKE A CONTRIBUTION TO YOUR RESEARCH HERE. SO--
translation.ko: 현재 진행 중인 박사님 연구에 기부를 하고 싶습니다

translation.en: I COULD WRITE ALL KINDS OF NUMBERS ON THIS CHECK, DR. GRANT.
translation.ko: 원하시는 액수를 이 수표에 써 드리겠습니다

translation.en: TELL ME...
WHAT'S IT GONNA TAKE?
EVEN WITH WHAT I PAY YOU, COULDN'T YOU AFFORD A BETTER BAG?
translation.ko: 급여 줬는데 새 가방도 못 샀나?

translation.en: NO WAY. THIS ONE'S LUCKY.
A COUPLE YEARS AGO, SOME BUDDIES AND I...
WENT HANG GLIDING OFF THESE CLIFFS IN NEW ZEALAND...
AND THIS BIG UPDRAFT CAME AND SWEPT ME RIGHT AGAINST THE SIDE, WHAM!
WOW, THAT DOES SOUND LUCKY.
THIS STRAP ALONE SAVED MY LIFE.
GOT HOOKED ON A ROCK AS I WAS FALLING.
REVERSE DARWINISM: SURVIVAL OF THE MOST IDIOTIC.
translation.ko: 다윈의 진화론에 반대되는 가장 멍청한 생존이군

translation.en: ALAN, I WANT TO THANK YOU FOR BRINGING ME ALONG.
YEAH, WELL, THE BONES WILL STILL BE THERE WHEN WE GET BACK.
THAT'S THE GREAT THING ABOUT BONES: THEY NEVER RUN AWAY.
translation.ko: 그게 뼈의 장점이지 절대 도망가지 않잖아

translation.en: THE TRUTH IS, YOU GOT ME INTO THIS,
AND I HAVE NO INTENTION OF BEING ON MY OWN WITH THESE PEOPLE.
translation.ko: 나 혼자 저 사람들과 있을 생각은 추호도 없네

translation.en: DON'T GET TOO EXCITED, BILLY.
CHANCES ARE WE WON'T SEE A THING.
translation.ko: 뭔가 볼 확률도 거의 없을 거야

translation.en: YOUR TURN TO BE NICE. WAKE ME WHEN WE GET THERE.
translation.ko: 이제 자네가 잘할 차례야 도착하면 깨워줘

translation.en: SO, HOW DO YOU KNOW THE KIRBYS?
UH, THROUGH OUR CHURCH.
[ Snarling ] ALAN.
[ Gasps ] ALAN.
WAKE UP. WE'RE ALMOST THERE.
[ Man Over Headphones ] UNIDENTIFIED AIRCRAFT APPROACHING ISLA SORNA, THIS IS SAN JUAN APPROACH.
translation.ko: 미확인 비행기가 섬으로 접근 중 여기는 산후안 관제소

translation.en: YOU'RE FLYING IN RESTRICTED AIRSPACE. IMMEDIATELY TURN TO COORDINATES TWO--
translation.ko: 너희는 출입 금지 구역 상공을 비행하고 있다 당장 기수를 돌려서...

translation.en: MY GOD, I'D FORGOTTEN.
WE DID IT, HONEY. WE'RE HERE.
[ Udesky ] COOPER, IF YOU SEE ANYTHING, YELL UP.
NO, I THOUGHT I'D KEEP IT TO MYSELF.
I'M SORRY. EVERYONE, IF YOU LOOK OUT THE LEFT OF THE PLANE, YOU CAN SEE A WHOLE HERD OF BRACHIOSAURS.
translation.ko: 모두 왼쪽을 보시면 브라키오사우루스 무리가 있어요

translation.en: IN FACT, YOU CAN SEE IN THE FRONT OF THE GROUP, THE ALPHA MALE GRAZING THERE.
translation.ko: 맨 앞에선 우두머리 수컷이 풀을 뜯는 게 보이죠

translation.en: UDESKY, NASH, HOW 'BOUT UP FRONT? YOU GUYS SEE ANYTHING?
NOTHING YET, MR. KIRBY.
YOU MEAN-- MRS. KIRBY, LOOK. OUT HERE YOU'LL SEE A GROUP OF TRICERATOPS--
translation.ko: 여기 앞쪽으론 트리케라톱스의 무리가 보이고... 착륙지가 보입니다 착륙할까요?

translation.en: MR. KIRBY, WE HAVE A LANDING STRIP UP AHEAD. YOU WANT ME TO PUT HER DOWN?
NO, NO. I TOLD YOU, I WANT TO CIRCLE FIRST, SEE THE WHOLE ISLAND.
translation.ko: 아니, 일단 돌면서 섬 전체를 먼저 보자니까요

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU MEAN SET IT DOWN? YOU CAN'T LAND HERE.
- WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT? - HOLD ON. I CAN EXPLAIN.
translation.ko: 잠깐만요, 설명할게요 이 섬에 착륙 못 해요!

translation.en: -YOU CANNOT LAND ON THIS ISLAND. -IT'S GONNA BE FINE. YOU JUST DON'T UNDERSTAND.
translation.ko: 이 섬에 착륙 못 해요! 괜찮을 겁니다

translation.en: - ARE YOU CRAZY? - [ Paul ] SIT DOWN, PLEASE.
[ Thump ] DR. GRANT, WILL YOU PLEASE SIT DOWN?
BILLY, TELL ME WE DIDN'T LAND.
translation.ko: 빌리, 우리 착륙 안 했다고 말해줘

translation.en: [ Amanda ] ERIC? ERIC?
BEN? ERIC? I THINK THEY'RE LOOKING FOR SOMEONE.
translation.ko: 에릭? 벤? 누군가를 찾고 있나 봐요

translation.en: [ Paul ] OH, DR. GRANT, ARE YOU ALL RIGHT?
I'M SORRY WE HAD TO BE SO-- WHO HIT ME? WHO HIT ME?
translation.ko: 괜찮으세요? 죄송해요, 어쩔 수 없었어요 누가 날 친 거죠?

translation.en: THAT WOULD BE COOPER.
THEY'RE SETTING UP A PERIMETER TO MAKE THE PLACE SAFE. WHAT ARE THEY DOING?
THESE GUYS ARE GOOD. ON THIS ISLAND, THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS SAFE.
[ Amanda ] ERIC! WE HAVE TO GET BACK ON THAT PLANE.
WILL YOU TELL YOUR WIFE TO STOP MAKING THAT NOISE?
translation.ko: 부인에게 그만 소리치라고 해요 저건 아주 안 좋은 생각입니다

translation.en: AMANDA! THAT IS A VERY, VERY BAD IDEA.
translation.ko: 부인에게 그만 소리치라고 해요 저건 아주 안 좋은 생각입니다 어맨다

translation.en: BEN? AMANDA? HONEY?
translation.ko: 여보, 박사님이 그건 아주 안 좋은 생각이래

translation.en: WHAT? DR. GRANT SAID THAT'S A BAD IDEA.
translation.ko: 여보, 박사님이 그건 아주 안 좋은 생각이래 뭐라고? 안 좋은 생각이라고

translation.en: - HE SAYS IT'S A BAD IDEA! - WHAT'S A BAD IDEA?
translation.ko: 안 좋은 생각이라고 뭐가 안 좋은 생각이야?

translation.en: - [ Dinosaur Roaring ] - WHAT WAS THAT?
THAT'S A TYRANNOSAURUS.
[ Gunshots ] I DON'T THINK SO. IT SOUNDS BIGGER.
WE HAVE TO LEAVE! WE HAVE TO LEAVE NOW!
[ Shouting, Indistinct ] [ Paul ] WHAT'S GOING ON?
GET IN THE PLANE!
COOPER'S A PROFESSIONAL. HE CAN HANDLE HIMSELF. WHAT ABOUT THE OTHER GUY?
translation.ko: 또 한 사람은요? 쿠퍼는 알아서 올 겁니다

translation.en: - [ Roaring, Gunshots ] - GET IN THE PLANE! HURRY!
IT'S ALL RIGHT.
PAUL, WE CAN'T-- IT'S ALL RIGHT. WE'LL JUST CIRCLE THE ISLAND.
translation.ko: - 여보 우린... - 섬 위를 돌아볼 거야

translation.en: GIVE ME A HAND, UDESKY.
HEY! STOP!
THAT'S COOPER. WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
- PLEASE STOP. - COOP, GET OUT OF THE WAY.
- [ Sobs ] - YOU KNOW I CAN'T STOP THIS PLANE.
- [ Screams ] - OH, MY GOD!
- [ Udesky ] - WE'RE GOING DOWN! FUEL CUT OFF!
YOU OKAY?
[ Udesky ] WE'RE OKAY UP HERE.
EVERYONE JUST STAY PUT. SAN JUAN APPROACH, MAYDAY!
translation.ko: 모두 움직이지 말아요 관제탑 나와라! 메이데이!

translation.en: - WHO HAS THE SATELLITE PHONE? - I DO.
translation.ko: 누구 위성 전화기 있어요? 나 있어요

translation.en: - I GOT IT RIGHT HERE. - I'M NOT GETTING ANYTHING. THE RADIO'S GONE.
WE HAVEN'T LANDED YET.
[ Recording ] ALL CIRCUITS ARE BUSY. DAMN IT! OH, MAN.
WHAT WAS THAT? [ Gasps ]
- [ Screaming ] - KEEP STILL! KEEP STILL! WHAT?
WHAT IS IT? WHAT?
WHAT IS IT? HOLD IT!
HANG ON, EVERYONE!
NO! NO! HELP ME!
MRS. KIRBY, COME BACK!
AMANDA! [ Dinosaur Roaring ]
FOLLOW ME! THIS WAY!
IN HERE!
I THINK WE LOST HIM.
[ Flies Buzzing ] IT'S OKAY, IT'S DEAD.
NOBODY MOVE A MUSCLE.
NO, NO, NO. PLEASE, PLEASE DON'T. STOP, P-PLEASE.
IT'S TIME YOU DID SOME EXPLAINING, MR. KIRBY.
WE CALLED EVERYONE. WE DID EVERYTHING WE COULD. NO ONE WOULD HELP US.
translation.ko: 모두에게 연락했죠 모든 걸 해봤지만 아무도 도우려 하지 않았어요

translation.en: THE COSTA RICAN GOVERNMENT SAID THIS IS A NO-FLY ZONE.
translation.ko: 코스타리카 정부는 비행 금지 구역이라고 하고

translation.en: THE U.S. EMBASSY-- THAT'S OUR U.S. EMBASSY--
TOLD US WE SHOULD ACCEPT THE INEVITABLE. CAN YOU BELIEVE THAT?
YOU LET A 12-YEAR-OLD GO PARASAILING ALONE? NO!
translation.ko: 12살짜리 꼬마 혼자 파라세일을 하게 했어요? 아뇨!

translation.en: - HE WASN'T ALONE. - BEN HILDEBRAND. HE WAS WITH A FRIEND OF MINE.
translation.ko: 혼자가 아니라 제 친구랑 있었어요 벤이죠

translation.en: PAUL AND I DIVORCED OVER A YEAR AGO.
-SO WHY ME? -HE SAID WE NEEDED SOMEONE WHO'D BEEN ON THE ISLAND BEFORE.
translation.ko: 왜 하필 나예요? 이 섬에 와 본 사람이 필요하다고 저 사람이 그랬어요

translation.en: YES, BUT I DID NOT TELL YOU TO KIDNAP SOMEBODY.
I HAVE NEVER BEEN ON THIS ISLAND.
translation.ko: 난 이 섬에 와 본 적이 없어요

translation.en: SURE YOU HAVE. YOU WROTE THAT BOOK.
THAT WAS ISLA NUBLAR. THIS IS ISLA SORNA, SITE "B."
translation.ko: 그건 이슬라 누블라섬이고 여긴 B 구역 이슬라 소르나죠

translation.en: - YOU MEAN THERE ARE - YOU STAY OUT OF THIS! TWO ISLANDS WITH DINOSAURS?
SO HOW LONG HAVE THEY BEEN MISSING?
EIGHT WEEKS. ALMOST EIGHT WEEKS NOW.
BILLY.
translation.ko: 우린 비행기로 돌아가서 쓸만한 걸 찾아 모으고

translation.en: WE GO BACK TO THE PLANE AND SALVAGE WHAT WE CAN, THEN WE MAKE FOR THE COAST.
translation.ko: 우린 비행기로 돌아가서 쓸만한 걸 찾아 모으고 해변으로 가세

translation.en: DR. GRANT, WE'RE NOT LEAVING THIS ISLAND WITHOUT OUR SON.
translation.ko: 아들을 찾지 않고는 이 섬에서 안 나갈 겁니다

translation.en: THEN YOU CAN GO AND LOOK FOR HIM...
OR YOU CAN STICK WITH US AS LONG AS YOU DON'T HOLD US UP.
translation.ko: 아니면 방해 안 하는 조건으로 우리와 함께 가도 좋소

translation.en: EITHER WAY... YOU PROBABLY WON'T GET OFF THIS ISLAND ALIVE.
translation.ko: 이러든 저러든 살아서 이 섬을 나갈 확률은 낮아요

translation.en: SO... WHAT DO WE DO?
WE SEARCH FOR YOUR SON... IN THE DIRECTION THAT THEY'RE GOING.
translation.ko: 저 사람들을 따라가면서 당신 아들을 찾아봅시다

translation.en: EXCELLENT. EXCELLENT.
OH, SORRY. SORRY.
IT'S NOTHING YOU HAVEN'T SEEN BEFORE, PAUL.
HOW MUCH WEIGHT DID YOU SAY YOU LOST? ABOUT 25 POUNDS.
translation.ko: 몸무게 얼마나 빠졌다고 했지? 한 11kg 정도 빠졌어 수영을 꾸준히 했지

translation.en: I'VE BEEN SWIMMING.
translation.ko: 한 11kg 정도 빠졌어 수영을 꾸준히 했지

translation.en: SWIMMING? YOU HATE TO SWIM. YOU DON'T EVEN KNOW HOW TO SWIM.
I KNOW. I LEARNED.
YOU LOOK GOOD. SO DO YOU.
WELL, IT'S A SUPERPREDATOR. HOW WOULD YOU CLASSIFY IT, BILLY?
SUCHIMIMUS. SNOUT.
NO, THINK BIGGER.
BARYONYX? NOT WITH THAT SAIL.
SPINOSAURUS AEGYPTICUS.
I DON'T REMEMBER THAT ON INGEN'S LIST.
translation.ko: 인젠사가 만든 공룡 중에 이런 건 없었어요

translation.en: IT WASN'T ON THEIR LIST, AND THAT MAKES ME WONDER WHAT ELSE THEY WERE UP TO.
translation.ko: 그래서 뭐가 더 있을까 걱정이 돼

translation.en: SO, MR. KIRBY, WHEN YOU CLIMBED K2,
DID YOU BASE CAMP AT 25 OR 30,000 FEET?
THIRTY THOUSAND FEET. WE WERE CLOSE TO THE TOP.
translation.ko: 9천m 지점요 거의 정상과 가까웠죠 정상보다 3백m 더 높이 있었네요

translation.en: YOU WERE ABOUT A THOUSAND FEET ABOVE IT, ACTUALLY.
MR. KIRBY. NO, NO, THAT'S A COMMON MISTAKE.
translation.ko: 잘못 생각하는 겁니다 커비 주식회사도 없죠?

translation.en: THERE'S NO SUCH THING AS KIRBY ENTERPRISES, IS THERE?
IT'S KIRBY PAINT AND TILE PLUS.
THE PLUS STANDS FOR BATHROOM FIXTURES.
WE'RE IN THE WESTGATE SHOPPING CENTER, ENID, OKLAHOMA.
SO I DON'T SUPPOSE THAT CHECK YOU WROTE US IS ANY GOOD.
[ Paul ] I WILL PAY YOU, NO MATTER WHAT. THIS IS GOOD. THIS IS GOOD.
HERE WE ARE IN THE WORST PLACE IN THE WORLD, AND WE'RE NOT EVEN BEING PAID.
translation.ko: 세계 최악의 장소에 있는데 돈도 못 받는단 말이군

translation.en: NOW, WAIT, FELLAS. HOLD ON. I'LL MAKE THIS UP TO YOU.
IF YOU EVER DO A BATHROOM OR A KITCHEN--
YOU'RE NOT REALLY A MERCENARY, ARE YOU?
I NEVER SAID I WAS. THAT'S TRUE.
translation.ko: 그렇다고 한 적 없소 그건 그렇군요

translation.en: WELL, I'M LIKE A BOOKING AGENT. WHAT ARE YOU?
ONE OF THE GUYS GOT SICK AND COULDN'T COME.
translation.ko: 한 사람이 아파서 내가 대신 왔어요

translation.en: EXCUSE ME. HERE.
SO YOU RUN A HARDWARE STORE?
HMM. PAINT AND TILE. YEAH.
YOU NEVER CAN TELL ABOUT PEOPLE, CAN YOU? AIN'T THAT THE TRUTH?
translation.ko: 사람은 겉만 보곤 절대 모르죠 정말 그렇죠?

translation.en: QUIET. ERIC?
WOULD YOU STOP THAT? DR. GRANT SAYS THIS IS VERY DANGEROUS TERRITORY.
translation.ko: 그만 좀 할래? 박사님이 여긴 굉장히 위험한 지역이라잖아

translation.en: MAYBE WE SHOULD SPLIT UP OR SOMETHING. WE COULD COVER TWICE AS MUCH GROUND.
translation.ko: 우리 흩어져서 찾자 더 넓게 찾아볼 수 있잖아

translation.en: "DR. GRANT SAYS--" DR. GRANT SAYS THAT'S A BAD IDEA.
WHAT'S THE GOOD OF HIRING AN EXPERT IF WE'RE NOT GONNA USE HIS ADVICE?
translation.ko: 전문가 조언을 안 들을 거면 뭐 하러 고용했어?

translation.en: YEAH, EXCEPT DR. GRANT ISN'T LOOKING FOR ERIC. HE'S LOOKING FOR THE COAST.
translation.ko: 박사는 에릭이 아니라 해변을 찾고 있다고

translation.en: OKAY, FINE. GO AHEAD AND SCREAM.
translation.ko: 그럼 맘대로 해, 소리쳐! 대신 공룡이 공격해오면 나한테 도움 청하지 마

translation.en: THEN WHEN THAT TRICYCLOPLOTS ATTACKS YOU, DON'T COME CRYING TO ME.
translation.ko: 대신 공룡이 공격해오면 나한테 도움 청하지 마

translation.en: DON'T WORRY ABOUT THAT. WHAT?
NOTHING. NEVER MIND. WHAT DID YOU SAY?
translation.ko: - 뭐라고 했어? - 됐어, 신경 쓰지 마

translation.en: WHAT DID YOU SAY? GOD, PAUL, JUST DROP IT.
IF WE SPLIT UP, I'M GOING WITH YOU GUYS.
translation.ko: 만약 우리가 둘로 나뉘면 난 당신들과 함께 갈 거요

translation.en: MRS. KIRBY-- [ Amanda, Paul ] ERIC!
MRS. KIRBY! ERIC!
MRS. KIRBY, THE CHANCES ARE REMOTE THEY'RE STILL IN THE VICINITY.
YOUNG ADULT.
[ Udesky ] HEY, GUYS.
THAT'S MY CAMERA. WAIT.
I GOT AN IDEA. THE BATTERY'S DEAD.
LET ME HAVE THE CAMERA.
[ Eric Over Video Camera ] WHERE WERE YOU ON THAT ONE, MA?
translation.ko: 엄마 어디 있었어요? - 뛰어서 받아봐 - 받아요

translation.en: [ Ben Over Video Camera ] OKAY, DIVE, DIVE. OKAY, DIVING.
[ Amanda Over Video Camera ] YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO CATCH IT. COME ON, MA!
[ Video Camera Continues ] I SHOT THIS THE MORNING THEY DISAPPEARED.
translation.ko: 엄마 받아요 받아야죠... 실종된 날 아침에 찍은 거야

translation.en: NO, I WANT THAT. LET ME TAKE THAT. COME ON, GIVE ME THAT.
[ Ben ] NO, NOT YET. [ Eric ] SEE ANYTHING YET?
translation.ko: 뭐 보여요? 아니, 아직 아무것도 안 보여

translation.en: [ Eric ] WHAT WAS THAT?
translation.ko: 아니, 아직 아무것도 안 보여 뭐죠?

translation.en: [ Ben ] UNCLIP US. THERE'S A BIG CLIP. I CAN'T SEE.
translation.ko: - 풀어줘, 큰 클립이 걸렸어 - 안 보여요

translation.en: I CAN'T DO IT.
I'M GONNA UNHOOK YOU, ALL RIGHT?
ONE, TWO, THREE.
OKAY, BUDDY? I'M GONNA DROP MYSELF DOWN NOW.
translation.ko: 괜찮지? 이제 나도 내려갈 거야 카메라가 아직 켜져 있어요

translation.en: THE CAMERA'S STILL ON. [ Pushes Button ]
HE'S ALIVE. I KNOW HE'S ALIVE.
WE'RE GONNA FIND HIM.
CAN YOU FLY ONE OF THOSE?
MAYBE, AS LONG AS THE SAIL'S NOT TORN.
translation.ko: 찢어지지만 않았다면 아마 탈 수 있을 거예요

translation.en: WELL, LET'S TAKE IT.
IF WE SPOT A PLANE, IT MIGHT BE A GOOD WAY TO GET ATTENTION.
translation.ko: 만약 비행기가 온다면 이걸로 신호를 보낼 수 있어

translation.en: PULL IT OVER THIS WAY.
I'LL GET IT. I'LL GET IT. OKAY, OKAY.
- GET HER BACK, MR. KIRBY. - AMANDA!
WAIT! [ Screaming ]
AMANDA?
AMANDA. AMANDA. AMANDA, STOP, STOP, STOP.
I'M SORRY. I'M SORRY ABOUT BEN.
IT'S NOT BEN, PAUL. IT'S ERIC.
HE'S OUT THERE ALL BY HIMSELF.
I KNOW, I KNOW.
OUR BABY'S OUT HERE ALL BY HIMSELF.
translation.ko: 우리 아이가 여기 혼자 있단 말이야

translation.en: LISTEN TO ME. WE'LL FIND HIM. I PROMISE.
[ Whispers ] PAUL.
[ Paul ] DR. GRANT! YOU SHOULD COME LOOK AT THIS!
[ Quietly ] RAPTOR!
WE'RE GONNA FIND HIM. YOU LISTENING TO ME? WE'RE GONNA FIND HIM.
THE KID'S GOT RESOURCES. REMEMBER WHAT IT WAS LIKE TO TRY TO GROUND HIM?
translation.ko: 영리한 애야 우리가 벌주려고 했을 때 어땠는지 기억나?

translation.en: WHERE'S BILLY?
I WAS PHOTOGRAPHING THE NEST. WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 둥지 사진 찍었어요

translation.en: I'M SORRY. DON'T DO THAT AGAIN.
IF WE LOSE YOU, IT'S JUST ME AND THE DAMN TOURISTS.
translation.ko: 자넬 잃으면 나랑 저 관광객들밖에 안 남아

translation.en: [ Paul ] I BET YOU ERIC'S IN THERE.
translation.ko: 에릭이 저 안에 있을 것 같지 않나요?

translation.en: DON'T YOU THINK? I'D BET MY BOTTOM DOLLAR.
translation.ko: 에릭이 저 안에 있을 것 같지 않나요? 내기해도 좋아요

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU THINK IT IS?
AS FAR AS I'M CONCERNED, IT'S THE FOUR SEASONS.
ERIC!
[ Quietly ] PAUL, DON'T!
WHAT THE HELL?
WHO'S GOT SOME CHANGE? IT ONLY TAKES QUARTERS.
translation.ko: 누구 동전 있어요? 동전만 받는 자판기네요

translation.en: I GOT, LIKE-- I GOT A BUCK TEN.
translation.ko: 누구 동전 있어요? 동전만 받는 자판기네요 1달러 10센트가 있는데...

translation.en: THIS IS HOW YOU MAKE DINOSAURS?
NO. THIS IS HOW YOU PLAY GOD.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 신이라도 된 듯 까분 거예요

translation.en: THIS WAY! THIS WAY!
IT'S LOCKED!
THIS WAY! THIS WAY! GO! GO!
HEY! OVER HERE! HEY! OVER HERE!
PUSH! [ Shouting ]
[ Cawing Continues ] MY GOD.
- [ Cawing ] - HE'S CALLING FOR HELP.
[ Cawing Continues ] COME ON!
HEAD TO THE HERD!
HEAD FOR THE TREES!
[ Screaming ] UDESKY.
[ Billy ] MR. KIRBY?
- BILLY? - IS ALAN WITH YOU?
MR. UDESKY? OH, MY GOD.
MR. UDESKY?
HE'S DEAD.
OH, MY GOD, NO, HE'S NOT!
- NO, WAIT! - WE GOTTA HELP HIM. SOMETHING'S NOT RIGHT.
translation.ko: - 기다려요, 뭔가 이상해요! - 가서 도와줘야 해요

translation.en: [ Paul ] AMANDA!
- HOLD ON! - [ Screams ]
THEY SET A TRAP. THEY ACTUALLY SET A TRAP.
WHAT ARE YOU SAYING?
WHAT ARE YOU LOOKING FOR?
WAIT!
THANKS.
THANKS A LOT, ERIC.
YOU KNOW WHO I AM? YEAH.
translation.ko: 제가 누군지 아세요? 응, 네 부모님이 여기 계셔 널 찾고 계시단다

translation.en: YOUR PARENTS ARE HERE. THEY'RE LOOKING FOR YOU.
translation.ko: 응, 네 부모님이 여기 계셔 널 찾고 계시단다

translation.en: TOGETHER?
TOGETHER.
THAT'S NOT GOOD. THEY DON'T DO SO WELL TOGETHER.
translation.ko: 별론데요, 함께 있으면 잘하는 게 없거든요

translation.en: YOU'D BE SURPRISED WHAT PEOPLE CAN DO WHEN THEY HAVE TO.
translation.ko: 위급한 상황에선 사람들이 얼마나 대단한지 넌 모를 거다

translation.en: YOU'RE ALAN GRANT.
WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?
YOUR PARENTS, UH,
INVITED ME ALONG.
I READ BOTH OF YOUR BOOKS.
I LIKED THE FIRST ONE MORE. BEFORE YOU WERE ON THE ISLAND.
translation.ko: 그 섬에 가시기 전에 쓰신 첫 번째 책이 더 좋아요

translation.en: YOU LIKED DINOSAURS BACK THEN.
BACK THEN THEY HADN'T TRIED TO EAT ME YET.
translation.ko: 그땐 공룡이 날 잡아먹으려고 하지 않았으니까

translation.en: WHEN INGEN CLEARED OUT, THEY LEFT A LOT OF STUFF BEHIND. ANY WEAPONS?
translation.ko: 인젠사가 많은 것을 남기고 떠났죠 - 무기도 있니? - 아뇨, 마지막 최루탄이었어요

translation.en: NO. AND I JUST USED THE LAST OF THE GAS GRENADES.
AND I APPRECIATE THAT. [ Coughing ]
BE CAREFUL WITH THAT. T-REX.
IT SCARES THE SMALLER ONES, BUT ATTRACTS ONE REALLY BIG ONE WITH A FIN.
translation.ko: 작은 공룡을 물리치죠 아주 큰 공룡은 불러들이지만요

translation.en: THIS IS T-REX PEE?
HOW'D YOU GET IT?
YOU DON'T WANNA KNOW.
SURE. DESSERT?
ERIC, I HAVE TO TELL YOU, I'M ASTONISHED THAT YOU'VE LASTED EIGHT WEEKS ON THIS ISLAND.
translation.ko: 네가 이 섬에서 8주나 버텼다니 정말 놀랍구나

translation.en: IS THAT ALL IT'S BEEN?
YOU'RE ALIVE, AND THAT'S THE IMPORTANT THING.
translation.ko: 네가 살아 있다는 것이 가장 중요한 거란다

translation.en: AND THANKS TO YOU, THAT'S ONE THING THAT WE HAVE IN COMMON.
translation.ko: 네 덕에 우리 사이에 공통점이 생겼구나

translation.en: DID YOU READ MALCOLM'S BOOK?
YEAH.
SO?
I-I DON'T KNOW. I MEAN, IT WAS KIND OF PREACHY.
translation.ko: 모르겠어요 조금은 지루했어요 그리고 모든 것이 너무 혼란스러워요

translation.en: AND TOO MUCH CHAOS. EVERYTHING'S CHAOS.
IT SEEMED LIKE THE GUY WAS KIND OF HIGH ON HIMSELF.
translation.ko: 그 사람 마약 하고 책을 썼나 봐요

translation.en: THAT'S TWO THINGS THAT WE HAVE IN COMMON.
translation.ko: 너와 나의 두 번째 공통된 의견이구나

translation.en: LISTEN. [ Chittering ]
COMPYS!
[ Billy ] ALAN!
ALAN!
ALAN!
NO MATTER HOW THIS TURNS OUT, IT WASN'T YOUR FAULT.
ERIC'S ALWAYS BEEN A STRONG-WILLED KID.
ALWAYS. THEN YOU THROW SOMEONE LIKE BEN HILDEBRAND INTO THE MIX--
translation.ko: 언제나... 벤 같은 사람한테 보내서 무슨 영향을 받았든...

translation.en: WELL--
"WELL" WHAT?
ALL I'M SAYING-- IT'S NOT YOUR FAULT.
NO, IF HE'D BEEN WITH YOU, HE'D BE COMPLETELY SAFE.
translation.ko: 아니, 당신이랑 있었다면 에릭은 무사했을 거야 당신은 항상 제한속도 아래로 운전하지

translation.en: YOU DRIVE FIVE MILES UNDER THE SPEED LIMIT, PAUL.
AND I'VE TOTALED THREE CARS IN THREE YEARS.
WELL, NOT THREE. THE BUICK WASN'T REALLY TOTALED.
I JUST SAID IT WAS 'CAUSE I WANTED TO GET THE S.U.V.
translation.ko: 내가 SUV를 타고 싶어서 그렇다고 얘기한 거야

translation.en: I AM SO SORRY THAT YOU HAVE TO BE HERE.
translation.ko: 당신을 여기 오게 해서 정말 미안해

translation.en: I'M NOT.
[ Alan ] YEAH, THERE'S A BOAT RIGHT ALONGSIDE THE BANK.
LOOKS IN GOOD SHAPE. RESCUE BOAT?
NO, NO. JUST SOMETHING LEFT BEHIND.
translation.ko: 아니 잔해 조각이긴 하지만 그래도 물엔 뜨잖니

translation.en: BUT IT FLOATS.
translation.ko: 잔해 조각이긴 하지만 그래도 물엔 뜨잖니

translation.en: WE STICK TO THE PLAN.
YOU'RE NOT GONNA LOOK FOR DR. GRANT? HEAD TO THE COAST.
GOING TO THE COAST WAS ALAN'S IDEA. IF HE'S ALIVE, THAT'S WHERE HE'S HEADED.
translation.ko: 해변으로 가는 게 박사님 계획이니 살아 있다면 해변으로 오시겠죠

translation.en: I AGREE. WHAT ABOUT ERIC?
ERIC'S A SMART KID. HE PROBABLY KNOWS HE STANDS HIS BEST CHANCE BY THE COAST.
translation.ko: 에릭은 영리하니까 꼭 해변으로 올 거야

translation.en: HE FIGURES ALL THE BIG DINOSAURS ARE IN THE CENTER OF THE ISLAND. RIGHT?
translation.ko: 큰 공룡들은 섬 중앙에 있는 걸 알고도 남는 애야 그렇죠?

translation.en: SURE.
KNOW WHAT THIS IS?
THAT'S A RAPTOR CLAW. USED TO HAVE ONE.
A FOSSIL.
MINE IS NEW.
HOW MUCH OF THE ISLAND DID YOU EXPLORE?
I STAYED PRETTY CLOSE TO THE COMPOUND.
I FIGURED IF ANYONE CAME LOOKING FOR ME, THAT'S WHERE THEY'D START.
translation.ko: 누구든 절 구하러 오면 거기부터 찾을 테니까요

translation.en: WE NEED TO GET TO THE COAST. THAT WAS THE PLAN.
translation.ko: 해변으로 가야 해 그게 계획이었어 확실해요? 해변으로 갈수록 더 큰 공룡이 나타나요

translation.en: ARE YOU SURE? CLOSER YOU GET TO THE WATER, THE BIGGER THINGS GET.
translation.ko: 확실해요? 해변으로 갈수록 더 큰 공룡이 나타나요

translation.en: WELL, IF WE CAN FIND OUR WAY DOWN INTO THE CANYON,
WE COULD FOLLOW THE RIVER OUT TO THE COAST.
translation.ko: 강을 따라서 해변으로 갈 수 있을 거다

translation.en: AFTER WE FIND YOUR PARENTS.
AND THEN WHAT? ONE STEP AT A TIME.
LISTEN.
WHAT?
THAT'S MY DAD'S SATELLITE PHONE! [ Cell Phone Ringing ]
WAIT A MINUTE! HOW DO YOU KNOW?
KIRBY PAINT AND TILE PLUS, IN WESTGATE! DAD!
MOM!
ERIC! ERIC!
ERIC! THIS WAY! ERIC! ERIC!
MOM! DAD!
MOM! ERIC!
MOM! DAD! MOM! DAD!
I KNEW IT! MY GOD! I KNEW IT.
- OH, MY GOD. - AM I GLAD TO SEE YOU.
HEY, YOU GOT MY BAG.
YEAH. LUCKY STRAP.
- WANT ME TO CARRY IT? - WE NEED TO FIND A GAP HERE.
translation.ko: 제가 들까요? 건너갈 틈을 찾아야 해

translation.en: -HOW DID YOU KNOW WE WERE HERE? -THE PHONE. THAT STUPID JINGLE FROM THE STORE, I HEARD IT.
translation.ko: 여기 있는지 어떻게 알았니? 바보 같은 아빠 전화기 벨소릴 들었죠

translation.en: YEAH, YOUR SATELLITE PHONE. WHERE IS IT? MY PHONE?
translation.ko: 내 전화기? - 위성 전화기요! - 어디 있어?

translation.en: - I DON'T HAVE IT. - WHEN DID YOU USE IT LAST?
UH, UH, ON THE PLANE.
I GOT A CALL ON THE PLANE, AND-- WHAT?
WHAT! I LOANED IT TO NASH.
HE MUST'VE HAD IT WHEN HE--
RUN.
ALAN, YOU WANNA GIVE ME THE BAG BACK?
THAT'S OKAY, BILLY, I GOT IT.
PLEASE GIVE ME THE BAG.
IT'S NOT SAFE.
RAPTOR EGGS.
DID YOU STEAL RAPTOR EGGS?
NOW IT ALL MAKES SENSE. [ Billy ] I SWEAR...
translation.ko: 이제 모두 이해가 가는군 만약 이렇게 될 줄 알았다면...

translation.en: IF I'D KNOWN THAT YOU WERE GONNA END UP WITH THEM--
I TOOK 'EM ON AN IMPULSE. I THOUGHT THEY'D BE WORTH A FORTUNE,
ENOUGH TO FUND THE DIG SITE ANOTHER TEN MORE YEARS.
translation.ko: 앞으로 10년간의 발굴 자금 마련에 쓰려고 했죠

translation.en: LOOK, YOU HAVE TO BELIEVE ME. THIS WAS A STUPID DECISION.
BUT I DID IT WITH THE BEST INTENTIONS.
WITH THE BEST INTENTIONS.
SOME OF THE WORST THINGS IMAGINABLE ARE BEING DONE... WITH THE BEST INTENTIONS.
translation.ko: 최악의 것들은 가끔 좋은 뜻에서 시작이 되지

translation.en: BILLY, AS FAR AS I'M CONCERNED,
YOU'RE NO BETTER THAN THE PEOPLE THAT BUILT THIS PLACE.
translation.ko: 이곳을 만든 사람들과 하나도 다르지 않아

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU DOING? THOSE THINGS ARE AFTER US BECAUSE OF THOSE.
translation.ko: 뭐 하시는 거예요? 그것들 때문에 우릴 뒤쫓잖아요

translation.en: "THOSE THINGS" KNOW WE HAVE THE EGGS.
translation.ko: 놈들은 우리한테 알이 있는 줄 알죠

translation.en: I DROP THEM IN THE RIVER, THEY'LL STILL BE AFTER US.
translation.ko: 알을 강에 버려도 우릴 쫓아 올 겁니다

translation.en: WHAT IF THEY CATCH US WITH 'EM?
WHAT IF THEY CATCH US WITHOUT 'EM?
[ Alan ] THERE'S A BOAT AT THE BOTTOM, JUST DOWNRIVER.
translation.ko: 강 아래쪽에 보트가 있어요 해변까지 가는 거 시도는 해봐야죠

translation.en: WE CAN TRY AND MAKE IT TO THE COAST, AT LEAST.
YEAH. [ Whistles ] YOU OKAY?
LET'S DO THIS ONE AT A TIME, SHALL WE?
translation.ko: 한 번에 한 사람씩 건넙시다 알았죠?

translation.en: OKAY, COME ON OVER!
ONE AT A TIME!
ALL RIGHT, ERIC, I'M GONNA LEAVE YOU JUST FOR A MINUTE, OKAY?
THEN YOU'RE GONNA BE RIGHT BEHIND ME, OKAY?
MOM, I'VE BEEN ALONE IN A WATER TRUCK FOR EIGHT WEEKS.
translation.ko: 엄마, 난 8주 동안 여기서 혼자 버텼어요

translation.en: I THINK I CAN MANAGE THE NEXT TWO MINUTES WITHOUT YOU.
ALL RIGHT. WE'RE ALL TOGETHER NOW.
OKAY, ERIC!
OKAY. OVER YOU GO. COME ON, HONEY.
MOM?
OH, MY GOD.
WHAT IS IT? IT'S A BIRDCAGE.
FOR WHAT?
- [ Screaming ] - ERIC!
ERIC. ERIC!
HELP ME!
I CAN'T SEE HIM! I CAN'T SEE HIM!
ERIC! ERIC!
- [ Babies Screeching ] - NO, NO!
THIS WAY!
BILLY? BILLY?
BILLY, STOP. BILLY, STOP! DON'T, BILLY!
translation.ko: 빌리, 멈춰 빌리, 멈춰 안 돼!

translation.en: BILLY!
ERIC, HOLD ON!
ERIC!
JUMP!
BILLY!
LET GO NOW!
ERIC? HE'S THERE.
ERIC? ERIC!
THERE HE IS! HE'S ACROSS THE RIVER!
GET HIM OUTTA HERE!
NO, NO. WHAT ABOUT BILLY? GO, ERIC.
- HANG ON, BILLY! - [ Screeching ]
WAIT. BILLY!
[ Gasping ] GET AWAY.
- GET AWAY! - [ Screeching ]
THERE'S PLENTY OF GASOLINE.
NOW WE JUST GOTTA MAKE OUR WAY TO THE COAST.
WORK OUT SOME SORT OF A SIGNAL.
translation.ko: 하늘에서 쉽게 볼 수 있는 불이든 뭐든

translation.en: BUILD A FIRE OR SOMETHING. SOMETHING THEY CAN SEE FROM THE AIR.
DR. GRANT?
HEY, ERIC, HOW YOU DOING?
I'M SORRY ABOUT BILLY.
YOU KNOW WHAT THE LAST THING I SAID TO HIM WAS?
translation.ko: 내가 빌리한테 마지막으로 뭐라고 했는지 아니?

translation.en: I SAID, "YOU'RE AS BAD AS THE PEOPLE THAT BUILT THIS PLACE."
translation.ko: 빌리도 이곳을 만든 사람들과 하나도 다르지 않다고 했어

translation.en: WHICH WASN'T TRUE. BILLY WAS JUST YOUNG.
translation.ko: 진심이 아니었어 아직 젊어서 그런 건데

translation.en: THAT'S ALL.
I HAVE A THEORY THAT THERE ARE TWO KINDS OF BOYS.
translation.ko: 난 세상엔 두 종류의 아이가 있다고 생각한다

translation.en: THERE ARE THOSE THAT WANT TO BE ASTRONOMERS,
AND THOSE THAT WANT TO BE ASTRONAUTS.
THE ASTRONOMER, OR THE PALEONTOLOGIST, GETS TO--
GETS TO STUDY THESE AMAZING THINGS FROM A PLACE OF COMPLETE SAFETY.
EXACTLY. BUT THEN YOU NEVER GET TO GO INTO SPACE.
translation.ko: 하지만 절대 우주로 나가지는 못하죠 바로 그거야! 그저 상상만 하는 것과

translation.en: THAT'S THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN IMAGINING AND SEEING:
translation.ko: 바로 그거야! 그저 상상만 하는 것과

translation.en: TO BE ABLE TO TOUCH THEM.
AND THAT'S... THAT'S ALL THAT BILLY WANTED.
DR. GRANT.
KNOW SOMETHING, DR. GRANT?
BILLY WAS RIGHT.
[ Cell Phone Ringing ] LISTEN!
- FIND IT - ERIC, YOU STAY ON THAT BOAT. BEFORE IT STOPS RINGING!
translation.ko: 벨이 멈추기 전에 찾아요! 에릭, 보트에 있어라

translation.en: IT'S HERE. WAIT. WHOA-WHOA, IT'S HERE.
HELLO? HELLO!
[ Man ] YOU TOO CAN OWN A TIME-SHARE IN BEAUTIFUL GUADALAJARA.
translation.ko: 당신도 환상의 여행을 떠날 수 있습니다 최고급 호텔에서 최고의 식사를 즐기세요

translation.en: ENJOY A MEAL IN ONE OF OUR FOUR-STAR RESTAURANTS-- LOOK OUT!
translation.ko: 최고급 호텔에서 최고의 식사를 즐기세요 조심해요!

translation.en: TURN UP THE POWER. YOU'VE GOT JUICE FOR MAYBE ONE CALL.
translation.ko: 전화기 꺼요 한 통 겨우 될 거예요

translation.en: WHATEVER YOU DO, DON'T CALL THE U.S. EMBASSY. THEY WON'T DO A DAMN THING.
translation.ko: 미국 대사관엔 하지 말아요 도움이 안 돼요

translation.en: HEY, GUYS! COME HERE! LOOK AT THIS!
SOMETHING MUST HAVE SPOOKED THEM. BONITOS.
GET THE ENGINE GOING, MR. KIRBY.
OPEN THE THROTTLE.
[ Phone Ringing ] PICK UP, PICK UP.
HELLO?
- ELLIE? - HELLO?
HELLO? CHARLIE! CHARLIE!
CHARLIE, TAKE THE PHONE TO MOMMY NOW.
translation.ko: 찰리, 엄마한테 어서 전화기 갖다 드려라

translation.en: TAKE THE PHONE TO MOMMY. IT'S THE DINOSAUR MAN.
LISTEN TO ME, CHARLIE. OKAY.
CHARLIE, ARE YOU TAKING THE PHONE TO MOM?
CHARLIE!
[ Barney On TV ] OH, HO-HO. HI, EVERYBODY!
IT'S GREAT TO BE HERE! HI, THERE! HOW ARE YOU TODAY?
translation.ko: 여기 와서 너무 좋네요 모두 잘 있죠?

translation.en: [ Barney ] THIS IS GONNA BE GREAT!
THE DINOSAUR MAN. WHO'S ON THE PHONE?
HE IS? ALAN?
LOOK IN THE BOXES! FIND A WEAPON!
- [ Ringing ] - WHERE'S THE PHONE? - THERE! - GET THE PHONE!
ELLIE? ELLIE, LISTEN TO ME.
ALAN, ARE YOU ON A CELL PHONE? I CAN'T HEAR YOU?
THE RIVER! SITE "B"! THE RIVER!
HELLO? [ Phone Beeping ]
DAD! DAD!
- [ Screams ] - PAUL!
DAD!
PAUL, YOU JERK!
YOU CAN'T LEAVE ME LIKE THIS!
translation.ko: 이렇게 날 두고 가면 어떻게 해!

translation.en: I'M NOT GOING ANYWHERE.
REMEMBER WHEN WE WENT FISHING A COUPLE SUMMERS AGO?
translation.ko: 2년 전에 다 같이 낚시 갔던 거 기억나니?

translation.en: I WAS PUTTING THE BOAT IN THE WATER, AND THE TRAILER SANK?
THE TOW TRUCK TRIED TO PULL US OUT, AND IT GOT DRAGGED IN TOO.
THE TRUCK DRIVER WANTED TO KNOCK MY LIGHTS OUT.
translation.ko: 견인차 운전사가 날 패고 싶어 했지

translation.en: I MISS FISHING.
[ Alan ] MR. KIRBY?
HMM? THAT LADY YOU CALLED.
WHO IS SHE? HOW DO YOU KNOW THAT SHE CAN HELP US?
translation.ko: 전화하신 여자분 누구예요? 우릴 도울지 어떻게 알죠?

translation.en: SHE WAS THE ONE PERSON I COULD ALWAYS COUNT ON. I OWE HER A LOT.
translation.ko: 내가 믿을 수 있고 빚도 많이 진 사람이란다

translation.en: ALTHOUGH I DON'T THINK I EVER TOLD HER THAT. YOU SHOULD.
translation.ko: 그런 말을 하진 못했지만 말이다 하세요

translation.en: [ Rumbling Sound ] SHH. YOU HEAR THAT?
THE OCEAN!
THEY WANT THE EGGS,
OTHERWISE WE'D BE DEAD ALREADY.
EVERYBODY GET DOWN. SHE'S CHALLENGING US.
translation.ko: 전부 무릎 꿇어요 우릴 시험하고 있어요

translation.en: SHE THINKS YOU STOLE THE EGGS.
- GET BEHIND ME. - [ Hissing ]
GIVE ME THE EGGS.
DO IT, MOM.
NO! NO, NO, NO. CALL FOR HELP.
THAT'S A HELICOPTER.
[ Over Bullhorn ] DR. GRANT? DR. ALAN GRANT?
STOP! THAT'S A VERY BAD IDEA!
WOW. YOU HAVE TO THANK HER NOW. SHE SENT THE NAVY AND THE MARINES!
GOD BLESS YOU, ELLIE.
DR. GRANT, THIS MAN WITH YOU? WHAT?
HEY, YOU MADE IT.
YEAH.
I RESCUED YOUR HAT.
DR. GRANT, WE NEED TO GO NOW.
OH, YEAH.
WELL, THAT'S THE IMPORTANT THING.
DR. GRANT!
CAN I GET YOU TO SIT HERE AND BUCKLE UP, SIR?
[ Pilot ] SEA SHADOW DUST STORM ZERO FIVE, SIX SOULS ON BOARD.
[ Control Tower ] DUST STORM SEA SHADOW, ROGER. GOOD WORK.
WHAT THE HELL IS THAT?
[ Eric ] DR. GRANT, LOOK!
WHERE DO YOU THINK THEY'RE GOING?
I DON'T KNOW. MAYBE JUST LOOKING FOR NEW NESTING GROUNDS.
IT'S A WHOLE NEW WORLD FOR THEM.
I DARE 'EM TO NEST IN ENID, OKLAHOMA.
LET'S GO HOME.
